value:
$WmMPID_エポニーヌ,ch05_43_Eponine_F_Normal,Face|Out of nowhere, I was summoned by
a mysterious man...and bound to a
contract!$k$pAnd that's just chapter one! I can't
wait to see what's coming up next...
Tee-hee!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|*sigh*$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|Are you OK?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Pain|How could you be? It's so hot here! I
feel like the energy is being drained
from my body...$k$pSooner or later, they're going to offer
us up to the Rite of Flame, aren't
they? We're going to die.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Most likely.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No, I don't want to die! I wanted to
see so many more worlds than this...$k$p$EFace_Smile|Bu-but I can't give up... My brother
and sister are on their way to save us.
They have to be. Right?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Do you always talk this much?$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Huh? Oh, I'm sorry...$k$pBut if somebody doesn't get here
soon, I... We...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face|Quit your sniffling, brat.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Smile|What? Oh! It's you!$k$pYou're still alive! I thought for sure...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Quiet! This place is crawling with
guards...$k$pQuick now, let's go. We want to be
out of here before Surtr notices.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|Wait—you're saving us? Why?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Questions, questions! Can't you just
be happy about it?$k$pI don't know why I'm helping you.
Not a clue! OK?$k$p$Sbs150|
